bibl.title: A Rediscovered Agricultural Hinterland of Karanis.
Karanis Revealed. Discovering the Past and Present of a Michigan Excavation in Egypt

bibl.note: Examines the irrigation system in proximity to Karanis.
bibl.seg: R. James Cook, A Rediscovered Agricultural Hinterland of Karanis.

Terry G. Wilfong (ed.), with the assistance of Andrew W.S. Ferrara, Karanis Revealed. Discovering the Past and Present of a Michigan Excavation in Egypt = Kelsey Museum Publication 7 (Ann Arbor, 2014) pp. 149-152, figg. 52-53.
Examines the irrigation system in proximity to Karanis.
